item.title: Etsy第四季度营收未达预期
item.description: 在线市场平台Etsy周四公布的第四季度营收未达华尔街预期，表明在持续的经济不确定性背景下，个性化礼品和手工制品的需求正在降温。【原文：Online marketplace Etsy missed Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter revenue on Thursday, indicating cooling demand for personalized gifts and handcrafted goods amid ongoing economic uncertainty.】

item.title: DoorDash股价飙升，外卖需求推动增长预期
item.description: 食品配送公司DoorDash周四盘前股价飙升约11%，此前该公司对第一季度市场订单总额作出强劲预测，押注需求稳定及业务的积极扩张。【原文：Food delivery firm DoorDash's shares surged about 11% premarket on Thursday following a strong forecast for first-quarter marketplace gross order value, betting on steady demand and aggressive expansion across businesses.】

item.title: 沃尔玛首席执行官弗纳以保守立场开启任期
item.description: 沃尔玛周四发布的年度销售额和利润预测低于市场预期，该公司正迎来约翰·弗纳担任首席执行官的新阶段。尽管假日季度期间，沃尔玛在在线配送领域的投资及其保持低价的策略吸引了消费者。【原文：Walmart forecast annual sales and profit below elevated expectations on Thursday as it enters a new chapter under CEO John Furner, even as investments in online delivery and its push to keep prices low drew shoppers during the holiday quarter.】

item.title: EPAM预测第一季度业绩符合预期
item.description: EPAM Systems周四公布的季度业绩符合预期，因企业持续投资于人工智能系统升级，推动了对该软件供应商服务的需求。【原文：EPAM Systems forecast first-quarter results in line with estimates on Thursday, as companies continue investing in AI-enhancement of their systems, boosting demand for the software provider's services.】

item.title: 早盘竞价：油价拖累科技股涨势
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: Figma股价飙升，人工智能推动软件设计支出增长
item.description: 周四盘前，Figma股价上涨约14%，投资者对这家软件设计供应商强劲的营收预期及其人工智能雄心的相关评论表示欢迎。【原文：Shares of Figma rose around 14% before the bell on Thursday as investors cheered the software design provider's strong revenue forecasts and commentary around its artificial intelligence ambitions.】

item.title: 约翰迪尔上调全年盈利预期，得益于工程机械业务与销售复苏；股价上涨
item.description: 农业机械制造商约翰迪尔公司周四上调了年度利润预期，称其建筑和小型农业业务出现反弹，且成本削减措施缓解了设备需求疲软的影响，其股价在盘前交易中上涨4.7%。【原文：Farm-machinery maker Deere & Co raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday citing a rebound in its construction and small agriculture businesses and cost cuts that mitigated weak equipment demand, sending its shares up 4.7% before the bell.】

item.title: Hims & Hers Health将以最高11.5亿美元收购澳大利亚桉树公司
item.description: Hims & Hers Health周四宣布将以最高11.5亿美元收购澳大利亚数字健康公司Eucalyptus。这家美国远程医疗企业正通过进军国际市场拓展个性化医疗业务，其股价在盘前交易中上涨近4%。【原文：Hims & Hers Health said on Thursday it will acquire Australian digital health company Eucalyptus in a deal valued at up to $1.15 billion, as the U.S. telehealth firm pushes into international markets to expand its personalized-care business, sending its shares up nearly 4% premarket.】

item.title: 石油公司争相竞标项目以快速提升委内瑞拉产量；真正的艰苦挑战还在后头
item.description: 九月，一艘用于浅水钻井的钻井平台完成了从中国到委内瑞拉马拉开波湖产油区的漫长航程。这艘名为"阿卢拉"的古老巨型钻井平台，在驶过连接马拉开波市与湖东岸油田的桥梁时，仅距桥面数英寸之遥，引发当地居民和工人的热烈欢呼——由于美国制裁，他们多年未曾见到新的钻井设备抵达。【原文：In September, a rig used to drill wells in shallow waters completed the long trip from China to Venezuela's oil-producing region of Lake Maracaibo. The passage of the big old rig named Alula just inches below the bridge connecting Maracaibo city with the oilfields of the lake's eastern coast stirred excitement among residents and workers: they had not seen any new drilling equipment arrive for years due to U.S. sanctions.】

item.title: Hims & Hers公司GLP-1口服药策略适得其反，加速了对药物配制商的打击力度
item.description: 在线远程医疗公司Hims & Hers Health在性健康业务趋于成熟之际寻求增长点，却因冒险推出减肥药而可能越界——该产品迅速招致丹麦制药商诺和诺德及美国监管机构的强烈反对。【原文：Online telehealth company Hims & Hers Health , seeking growth drivers as its original sexual-health franchises matured, may have overstepped with a risky launch of weight-loss pills that drew swift blowback from Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk and U.S. regulators.】

item.title: 边疆航空押注经济型旅客，而其他航空公司则聚焦高端市场
item.description: 边疆航空母公司边疆集团控股公司正大胆押注预算有限的旅客群体——尽管业内多数人坚称高端消费者才是发展方向，但这些旅客已开始勒紧裤腰带。【原文：Frontier Group Holdings , the parent of Frontier Airlines, is making a bold bet on budget travelers who have tightened their belts while much of the industry insists that premium spenders are the way to go.】

item.title: 特朗普将在佐治亚州推出新经济方案，因物价居高不下
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普将于周四在佐治亚州发表一系列经济演讲中的最新一次，试图在11月中期国会选举前向选民证明，他和共和党同僚拥有降低物价的方案。【原文：President Donald Trump will give the latest in a series of economic speeches in Georgia on Thursday as he seeks to persuade voters he and fellow Republicans have a plan to lower prices ahead of November's midterm congressional elections.】

item.title: 美国车企卷入特朗普与加州电动汽车之争的交火中
item.description: 特朗普政府与加州围绕汽车污染法规的法律冲突正趋于白热化，这场争端将对包括特斯拉在内的电动汽车制造商以及依赖化石燃料车辆的传统汽车制造商产生巨大的财务影响。【原文：A legal clash between the Trump administration and California over auto-pollution rules is coming to a head, with enormous financial implications for EV makers including Tesla and traditional automakers dependent on fossil-fuel vehicles.】

item.title: 拉斯维加斯游客量骤降，休闲消费持续萎缩
item.description: 每逢周五，这里依然充满拉斯维加斯的高峰期氛围——拉着行李箱的人潮、拥挤的拼车队伍，以及哈里·里德国际机场里熟悉的喧嚣。到了周一，机场便已恢复宁静。【原文：On Fridays, it still feels like peak Vegas — rolling suitcases, packed rideshare queues and the familiar churn at Harry Reid International. By Monday, the airport has quieted considerably.】

item.title: 拜耳：美国总统令颁布后，预计除美国外其他地区不会出现草甘膦短缺
item.description: 拜耳公司周四表示，美国总统援引《国防生产法》确保美国草甘膦供应的行政命令，凸显了美国农民获取该除草剂的迫切需求，并强调此举不会导致其他国家出现供应短缺。【原文：The U.S. President's executive order invoking the Defense Production Act to ensure U.S. supply of glyphosate underscores U.S. farmers' needs to have access to the herbicide, Bayer said on Thursday, adding the move would not lead to shortages in other countries.】

item.title: 美国股指期货下跌，市场关注点转向人工智能担忧及沃尔玛财报
item.description: 周四美国股指期货小幅下挫，标普500指数三连涨势头就此终结。投资者正评估人工智能相关担忧，同时等待零售业风向标沃尔玛的季度业绩——该报告预计将于当日晚些时候发布。【原文：U.S. stock index futures dipped slightly on Thursday, halting a three-day winning streak for the S&P 500 as investors evaluated AI-related concerns and awaited retail bellwether Walmart's quarterly results, expected to be released later in the day.】

item.title: 泰克资源季度利润超预期，得益于铜价上涨与产量提升
item.description: 泰克资源公司周四公布的季度利润超出预期，得益于铜价和产量的激增。这家加拿大矿业公司同时推进了与英美资源集团的拟议合并计划。【原文：Teck Resources beat fourth-quarter profit expectations on Thursday, helped by a surge in copper prices and production, as the Canadian miner advanced its proposed merger with Anglo American .】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，Gunvor管理层收购案将该贸易集团估值定在约50亿美元
item.description: 据两名消息人士及路透社基于员工贷款融资方案的计算显示，大宗商品贸易商Gunvor的管理层收购案已将该集团估值推高至约50亿美元。【原文：A management buyout of commodity trader Gunvor has valued the group at around $5 billion, according to two sources and a Reuters calculation based on deal's financing via a loan to staff.】

item.title: 莫迪的人工智能团结姿势让阿尔特曼和阿莫代感到尴尬
item.description: 当印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪在印度人工智能峰会上示意发言者举手以象征团结时，多数高管都配合了这一举动。但有两人例外：OpenAI的萨姆·阿尔特曼与Anthropic的达里奥·阿莫代——这两位竞争对手拒绝了。【原文：When Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi nudged speakers at the India AI summit to join and raise their hands in a symbolic show of unity, most executives obliged. Two did not: rivals Sam Altman of OpenAI and Dario Amodei of Anthropic.】

item.title: 经济学家称日本央行加息至1%或引发资金大动荡
item.description: 一位首席经济学家周四对路透社表示，日本短期利率预计将升至1%，这可能引发大量资金重新配置至存款，从而使日本央行的货币政策实施面临复杂局面。【原文：An expected rise in Japan's short-term interest rate to 1% may trigger a significant reallocation of cash into deposits that could complicate the Bank of Japan's monetary policy implementation, a leading economist told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家：欧洲央行行长拉加德向同事暗示离职尚无时间表
item.description: 欧洲央行行长拉加德向同事表示，她仍专注于本职工作，若决定辞职将第一时间告知他们。四位消息人士向路透社透露，同事们将此解读为她无意辞职。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde has told colleagues she remains focussed on her job and she would tell them first if she was about to step down, a message they took to mean she was not about to resign, four sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 科技巨头在人工智能峰会上向印度投入数十亿美元
item.description: 本周，全球人工智能企业的高管们齐聚印度，与各国领导人共同出席了一场重要的人工智能峰会。【原文：Senior executives from global artificial intelligence firms joined world leaders in India this week for a major AI summit.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，日产因发动机和变速箱问题将在美国召回约64.3万辆SUV
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周四表示，日产汽车因存在可能导致驱动动力丧失的问题，将在美国召回642,698辆Rogue SUV，此次召回涉及两项独立召回行动。【原文：Nissan is recalling 642,698 Rogue SUVs in the U.S. as part of two separate recalls, over issues that could cause loss of drive power, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Thursday.】

item.title: 谷歌与Shopee母公司海大洋将联合开发电商及游戏领域的人工智能工具
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet与东南亚科技集团Sea Ltd周四宣布达成新合作，将为Sea的电商和游戏产品开发人工智能工具。【原文：Alphabet Inc's Google and Southeast Asian technology conglomerate Sea Ltd announced a new tie-up on Thursday that will develop artificial intelligence tools for Sea's e-commerce and gaming products.】

item.title: 保乐力加上半年销售额下滑，第二季度趋势好转
item.description: 法国烈酒制造商保乐力加报告称，第二季度同店销售额下降5%，原因是美国和中国市场消费需求疲软以及库存调整持续拖累业绩。【原文：French spirits maker Pernod Ricard reported a 5% decline in second-quarter like-for-like sales, as weak consumer demand and destocking in the United States and China continued to weigh.】

item.title: 安巴尼的信实集团将斥资1100亿美元投资人工智能
item.description: 印度信实工业集团及其子公司Jio将在未来七年内投资10万亿卢比（约合1100亿美元）用于人工智能领域，该集团亿万富翁董事长穆克什·安巴尼周四宣布。【原文：India's Reliance Industries and its unit Jio will invest 10 trillion rupees ($110 billion) over the next seven years in artificial intelligence, billionaire Chairman Mukesh Ambani said on Thursday.】

item.title: 雅高酒店集团2025年利润勉强达到预期
item.description: 法国酒店集团雅高周四公布的年度核心利润略高于市场预期，这得益于其酒店组合的多样化发展及其忠诚度计划的扩展。【原文：French hotel group Accor reported annual core profit just above market expectations on Thursday, supported by the diversification of its hotel portfolio and the expansion of its loyalty program.】

item.title: 《金融时报》称摩根大通正就为特朗普和平委员会提供银行服务进行谈判
item.description: 据《金融时报》周四报道，摩根大通正就为美国主导的加沙重建机构"和平委员会"提供银行服务进行磋商，消息人士透露了相关讨论情况。【原文：JPMorgan is in talks to provide banking services to the U.S.-led Board of Peace, an institution tasked with rebuilding Gaza, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 电报公司驳斥俄罗斯关于外国情报机构破解其加密系统的指控
item.description: Telegram即时通讯应用表示，其加密系统未发现任何漏洞，驳斥了俄罗斯政府关于外国情报机构能够查看俄军士兵发送消息的指控。【原文：The Telegram messaging app said that it had not found any breaches of its encryption, dismissing a Russian government allegation that foreign intelligence services are able to see messages sent by Russian soldiers.】

item.title: 雀巢第四季度销售额超预期，首席执行官聚焦战略之际计划出售冰淇淋业务
item.description: 雀巢周四公布的第四季度销售额增长超出预期，并表示正将业务重心聚焦于四大核心领域，由其最强品牌引领。该战略调整包括计划出售旗下剩余的冰淇淋业务。【原文：Nestle reported better than expected fourth-quarter sales growth on Thursday and said it was sharpening its focus to four businesses led by its strongest brands, a drive that includes plans to sell off its remaining ice cream business.】
